     (function(undefined) {
      if (!('IntersectionObserver' in this)) {
        var src = 'https://cdn.polyfill.io/v2/polyfill.min.js?features=IntersectionObserver&flags=gated';
        var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
        xhr.onreadystatechange = function() {
            if (xhr.readyState == XMLHttpRequest.DONE) {
              var f = new Function(xhr.responseText);
              f();
            }
        }
        xhr.open('GET', src, false);
        xhr.send();
      }
    })
    .call('object' === typeof window && window || 'object' === typeof self && self || 'object' === typeof global && global || {});

     <div class="jsx-4032843188 content-header">
      <h1 class="jsx-928984976 title">
       The 100 Best Movies Of All Time
      </h1>
      <div class="jsx-901023059 hero-image">
       <div class="jsx-3628565330 image-container">
        <div class="jsx-1901279781 image-loading">
        </div>
        <div class="lazyLoad">
         <picture class="jsx-2590794431">
          <source class="jsx-2590794431" media="(min-width:1600px)" srcset=""/>
          <source class="jsx-2590794431" media="(min-width:1000px)" srcset=""/>
          <source class="jsx-2590794431" media="(min-width:749px)" srcset=""/>
          <source class="jsx-2590794431" media="(min-width:550px)" srcset=""/>
          <img alt="The Godfather" class="jsx-2590794431 loading" data-src="//images.bauerhosting.com/empire/2022/01/the-godfather.jpg?q=80&amp;auto=format&amp;w=440&amp;ar=16:9&amp;fit=crop&amp;crop=top" src="" title=""/>
         </picture>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="jsx-901023059 hero-overlay">
      </div>
     </div>
     <hr class="jsx-4032843188 hero-underline"/>
     <div class="jsx-3836731496 author">
      <span class="jsx-3836731496 author-prefix">
       by
       <!-- -->
      </span>
      <span class="jsx-3836731496 author-name">
       Team Empire
      </span>
      <span class="jsx-3836731496">
       <!-- -->
       |
       <!-- -->
      </span>
      <div class="jsx-3836731496 author-date">
       <span class="jsx-3836731496 modified-at">
        Posted on
       </span>
       <time class="jsx-3836731496" datetime="23 01 2023">
        23 01 2023
       </time>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="jsx-1456218620 article-content">
      <span class="jsx-3335677532 content">
       <p>
        It�s a big question: what are the best movies of all time? And it�s one with many answers � there are all kinds of reasons why the greatest films ever made endure in the way they do. They create unforgettable images, conjure overwhelming emotions, craft thrilling stories, and deliver characters who leap off the screen. There�s astonishing technical mastery that brings those stories to life, plots that twist and turn in all kinds of unexpected ways, performances that help us fall head-over-heels for people who don�t exist, and transcendent experiences that change our heads and hearts. The best films � from classic movies that have stood the test of time, to contemporary works that changed the game � offer heartwarming comfort, iconic scares, big laughs, and pulse-pounding suspense, becoming firm audience favourites and garnering critical acclaim.
       </p>
      </span>
      <span class="jsx-3335677532 content">
       <p>
        In creating a list of the 100 best movies of all time,
        <em>
         Empire
        </em>
        asked readers to share their picks � a selection of movies that comfort, challenge, and pioneer. Films that blow your mind, help you see things from a new perspective, and that continue to shape cinema as we know it today. Films that make you
        <em>
         feel
        </em>
        something. Combining reader votes with critics� choices from Team Empire, here we have it � read it in full below.
       </p>
      </span>
      <span class="jsx-3335677532 content">
       <p>
        Looking for our list of
        <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/movies/features/best-tv-shows-ever-2/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
         The 100 Greatest TV Shows Of All Time? Read here
        </a>
        .
       </p>
      </span>
      <div class="jsx-3523802742 block-item listicle-container">
       <div class="jsx-3523802742 listicle-item" data-test="listicle-item-0">
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-header">
         <span class="jsx-4245974604 icon">
          <svg aria-labelledby="icon_labelledby_1613592" style="width:1.5rem;height:1.5rem" viewbox="0 0 24 24">
           <title id="icon_labelledby_1613592">
            Gallery
           </title>
           <path d="M22,16V4A2,2 0 0,0 20,2H8A2,2 0 0,0 6,4V16A2,2 0 0,0 8,18H20A2,2 0 0,0 22,16M11,12L13.03,14.71L16,11L20,16H8M2,6V20A2,2 0 0,0 4,22H18V20H4V6" style="fill:currentColor">
           </path>
          </svg>
         </span>
         <h2 class="jsx-4245974604">
          100 Greatest Movies 2022
         </h2>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-image">
         <div class="jsx-3628565330 image-container">
          <div class="jsx-1901279781 image-loading">
          </div>
          <div class="lazyLoad">
           <picture class="jsx-2590794431">
            <source class="jsx-2590794431" media="(min-width:480px)" srcset=""/>
            <img alt="Reservoir Dogs" class="jsx-2590794431 loading" data-src="//images.bauerhosting.com/legacy/media/619d/56e6/5165/4360/a43b/78f6/IMG_0302.jpeg?q=80&amp;auto=format&amp;w=500" src="" title=""/>
           </picture>
          </div>
         </div>
         <span class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-count">
          1
          <!-- -->
          of
          <!-- -->
          100
         </span>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-content">
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/quentin-tarantino/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Quentin Tarantino
          </a>
          's terrific twist on the heist-gone-wrong thriller ricochets the zing and fizz of its dialogue around a gloriously intense single setting (for the most part) and centres the majority of its action around one long and incredibly bloody death scene. Oh, and by the way: Nice Guy Eddie was shot by Mr. White. Who fired twice. Case closed.
         </p>
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/movies/reviews/empire-essay-reservoir-dogs-review/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Read Empire's review of Reservoir Dogs
          </a>
         </p>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 bottom">
         <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-brand">
          <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-content">
          </div>
          <div class="jsx-4290002108 brand">
           <img alt="Amazon" class="jsx-4290002108 amazon-no-prime" src="data:image/png;base64,"/>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="jsx-3523802742 listicle-item" data-test="listicle-item-1">
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-image">
         <div class="jsx-4195365159 image-container">
          <div class="jsx-1901279781 image-loading">
          </div>
          <div class="lazyLoad">
           <picture class="jsx-2590794431">
            <source class="jsx-2590794431" media="(min-width:480px)" srcset=""/>
            <img alt="Groundhog Day" class="jsx-2590794431 loading" data-src="//images.bauerhosting.com/legacy/media/619d/5761/f590/5edf/a806/4660/IMG_0301.jpeg?q=80&amp;auto=format&amp;w=500" src="" title=""/>
           </picture>
          </div>
         </div>
         <span class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-count">
          2
          <!-- -->
          of
          <!-- -->
          100
         </span>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-content">
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/bill-murray/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Bill Murray
          </a>
          at the height of his loveable (eventually) schmuck powers.
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/andie-macdowell/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Andie McDowell
          </a>
          bringing the brains and the heart. And
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/harold-ramis/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Harold Ramis
          </a>
          (directing and co-writing with Danny Rubin) managing to find gold in the story of a man trapped in a time loop. It might not have been the first to tap this particular trope, but it's head and shoulders above the rest. Murray's snarktastic delivery makes the early going easy to laugh at, but as the movie finds deeper things to say about existence and morals, it never feels like a polemic.
         </p>
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/movies/reviews/groundhog-day-review/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Read Empire's review of Groundhog Day
          </a>
         </p>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 bottom">
         <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-brand">
          <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-content">
          </div>
          <div class="jsx-4290002108 brand">
           <img alt="Amazon" class="jsx-4290002108 amazon-no-prime" src="data:image/png;base64,"/>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="jsx-3523802742 listicle-ad-wrapper">
        <div class="jsx-584588131">
         <div class="jsx-584588131 advert" id="inline-mpu-gallery-01">
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="jsx-3523802742 listicle-item" data-test="listicle-item-2">
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-image">
         <div class="jsx-3628565330 image-container">
          <div class="jsx-1901279781 image-loading">
          </div>
          <div class="lazyLoad">
           <picture class="jsx-2590794431">
            <source class="jsx-2590794431" media="(min-width:480px)" srcset=""/>
            <img alt="Paddington 2" class="jsx-2590794431 loading" data-src="//images.bauerhosting.com/legacy/media/619d/590a/f590/5e6f/8a06/4673/IMG_0300.JPG?q=80&amp;auto=format&amp;w=500" src="" title=""/>
           </picture>
          </div>
         </div>
         <span class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-count">
          3
          <!-- -->
          of
          <!-- -->
          100
         </span>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-content">
         <p>
          When the first
          <em>
           Paddington
          </em>
          was on the way, early trailers didn't look entirely promising. Yet co-writer/director
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/paul-king/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Paul King
          </a>
          delivered a truly wonderful film bursting with joy, imagination, kindness and just one or two hard stares. How was he going to follow that? Turns out, with more of the same, but also plenty of fresh pleasures. Paddington (bouncily voiced by
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/ben-whishaw/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Ben Whishaw
          </a>
          ) matches wits with washed-up actor Phoenix Buchanan (
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/hugh-grant/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Hugh Grant
          </a>
          , chewing scenery like fine steak), being framed for theft and getting sent to prison. Like all great sequels, it works superbly as a double bill with the original.
         </p>
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/movies/reviews/paddington-2-review/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Read Empire's review of Paddington 2
          </a>
         </p>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 bottom">
         <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-brand">
          <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-content">
          </div>
          <div class="jsx-4290002108 brand">
           <img alt="Amazon" class="jsx-4290002108 amazon-no-prime" src="data:image/png;base64,"/>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="jsx-3523802742 listicle-item" data-test="listicle-item-3">
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-image">
         <div class="jsx-3111586403 image-container">
          <div class="jsx-1901279781 image-loading">
          </div>
          <div class="lazyLoad">
           <picture class="jsx-2590794431">
            <source class="jsx-2590794431" media="(min-width:480px)" srcset=""/>
            <img alt="Amelie" class="jsx-2590794431 loading" data-src="//images.bauerhosting.com/legacy/media/619d/5a19/5165/432a/703b/7912/IMG_0299.jpeg?q=80&amp;auto=format&amp;w=500" src="" title=""/>
           </picture>
          </div>
         </div>
         <span class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-count">
          4
          <!-- -->
          of
          <!-- -->
          100
         </span>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-content">
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/jean-pierre-jeunet/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Jean-Pierre Jeunet
          </a>
          's beautifully whimsical Parisian rom-com succeeded not only because he found the perfect lead in
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/audrey-tautou/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Audrey Tautou
          </a>
          , but also because his numerous surreal touches truly gave a sense that there is always magic in the world around us � if we only know how to look for it.
         </p>
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/movies/reviews/amelie-review/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Read Empire's review of Amelie
          </a>
         </p>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 bottom">
         <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-brand">
          <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-content">
          </div>
          <div class="jsx-4290002108 brand">
           <img alt="Amazon" class="jsx-4290002108 amazon-no-prime" src="data:image/png;base64,"/>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="jsx-3523802742 listicle-ad-wrapper">
        <div class="jsx-584588131">
         <div class="jsx-584588131 advert" id="inline-mpu-gallery-02">
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="jsx-3523802742 listicle-item" data-test="listicle-item-4">
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-image">
         <div class="jsx-1014821930 image-container">
          <div class="jsx-1901279781 image-loading">
          </div>
          <div class="lazyLoad">
           <picture class="jsx-2590794431">
            <source class="jsx-2590794431" media="(min-width:480px)" srcset=""/>
            <img alt="Brokeback Mountain" class="jsx-2590794431 loading" data-src="//images.bauerhosting.com/legacy/media/619d/5af1/dbee/af61/2a68/fd95/IMG_0298.jpeg?q=80&amp;auto=format&amp;w=500" src="" title=""/>
           </picture>
          </div>
         </div>
         <span class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-count">
          5
          <!-- -->
          of
          <!-- -->
          100
         </span>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-content">
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/ang-lee/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Ang Lee
          </a>
          adapts Annie Proulx's short story (with
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/larry-mcmurtry/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Larry McMurtry
          </a>
          and
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/diana-ossana/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Diana Ossana
          </a>
          on script duty) with sensitivity, grace, and differing scope � the intimacy of the relationship between
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/jake-gyllenhaal/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Jake Gyllenhaal
          </a>
          and
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/heath-ledger/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Heath Ledger
          </a>
          's shepherds backed by beautiful mountain landscapes. The love between Ennis Del Mar (Ledger) and Jack Twist (Gyllenhaal) is complicated by the mores of the time and their need to marry their respective girlfriends. It'll break your heart and offer hope all at the same time, and the film ended up scoring Best Adapted Screenplay, Music and Directing Oscars.
         </p>
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/movies/reviews/brokeback-mountain-review/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Read Empire's review of Brokeback Mountain
          </a>
         </p>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 bottom">
         <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-brand">
          <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-content">
          </div>
          <div class="jsx-4290002108 brand">
           <img alt="Amazon" class="jsx-4290002108 amazon-no-prime" src="data:image/png;base64,"/>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="jsx-3523802742 listicle-item" data-test="listicle-item-5">
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-image">
         <div class="jsx-3628565330 image-container">
          <div class="jsx-1901279781 image-loading">
          </div>
          <div class="lazyLoad">
           <picture class="jsx-2590794431">
            <source class="jsx-2590794431" media="(min-width:480px)" srcset=""/>
            <img alt="Donnie Darko" class="jsx-2590794431 loading" data-src="//images.bauerhosting.com/legacy/media/619d/5c11/dbee/afc5/5968/fda3/IMG_0297.jpeg?q=80&amp;auto=format&amp;w=500" src="" title=""/>
           </picture>
          </div>
         </div>
         <span class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-count">
          6
          <!-- -->
          of
          <!-- -->
          100
         </span>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-content">
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/richard-kelly/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Richard Kelly
          </a>
          's time-looping, sci-fi-horror-blending high-school movie is the very definition of a cult classic. It was a struggle to get made, it flopped on release, then found its crowd via word-of-mouth and a palpable sense that its creator really, you know, gets it. And let's not forget how goddamn funny it is, too.
         </p>
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/movies/reviews/donnie-darko-review/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Read Empire's review of Donnie Darko
          </a>
         </p>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 bottom">
         <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-brand">
          <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-content">
          </div>
          <div class="jsx-4290002108 brand">
           <img alt="Amazon" class="jsx-4290002108 amazon-no-prime" src="data:image/png;base64,"/>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="jsx-3523802742 listicle-ad-wrapper">
        <div class="jsx-584588131">
         <div class="jsx-584588131 advert" id="inline-mpu-gallery-03">
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="jsx-3523802742 listicle-item" data-test="listicle-item-6">
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-image">
         <div class="jsx-3628565330 image-container">
          <div class="jsx-1901279781 image-loading">
          </div>
          <div class="lazyLoad">
           <picture class="jsx-2590794431">
            <source class="jsx-2590794431" media="(min-width:480px)" srcset=""/>
            <img alt="Scott Pilgrim Vs. The World" class="jsx-2590794431 loading" data-src="//images.bauerhosting.com/legacy/media/619d/5caa/5909/d042/bd4c/85f9/IMG_0296.JPG?q=80&amp;auto=format&amp;w=500" src="" title=""/>
           </picture>
          </div>
         </div>
         <span class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-count">
          7
          <!-- -->
          of
          <!-- -->
          100
         </span>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-content">
         <p>
          With
          <em>
           Scott Pilgrim Vs. The World
          </em>
          ,
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/edgar-wright/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Edgar Wright
          </a>
          leaned all the way in to the things that make his directorial style so singular � excellent needle drops, a bold colour palette, whip-pans and whip-smart wit alike.
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/michael-cera/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Michael Cera
          </a>
          is the put-upon protagonist, but it's Ramona's (
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/mary-elizabeth-winstead/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Mary Elizabeth Winstead
          </a>
          ) seven deadly exes that set the screen alight, including
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/chris-evans/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Chris Evans
          </a>
          and
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/brie-larson/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Brie Larson
          </a>
          � before they were saving half the universe together. With masterful touches of magical realism and stunning shots that stick in the mind throughout,
          <em>
           Scott Pilgrim
          </em>
          is one of Wright's most memorable.
         </p>
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/movies/reviews/scott-pilgrim-vs-world-review/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Read Empire's review of Scott Pilgrim
          </a>
         </p>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 bottom">
         <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-brand">
          <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-content">
          </div>
          <div class="jsx-4290002108 brand">
           <img alt="Amazon" class="jsx-4290002108 amazon-no-prime" src="data:image/png;base64,"/>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="jsx-3523802742 listicle-item" data-test="listicle-item-7">
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-image">
         <div class="jsx-3628565330 image-container">
          <div class="jsx-1901279781 image-loading">
          </div>
          <div class="lazyLoad">
           <picture class="jsx-2590794431">
            <source class="jsx-2590794431" media="(min-width:480px)" srcset=""/>
            <img alt="Portrait Of A Lady On Fire" class="jsx-2590794431 loading" data-src="//images.bauerhosting.com/legacy/media/619d/5ddd/f590/5ef7/2c06/46a5/IMG_0295.jpeg?q=80&amp;auto=format&amp;w=500" src="" title=""/>
           </picture>
          </div>
         </div>
         <span class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-count">
          8
          <!-- -->
          of
          <!-- -->
          100
         </span>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-content">
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/celine-sciamma/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Celine Sciamma
          </a>
          's magnetic, masterful lesbian romance may be a recent addition to this list, but became an instant landmark of queer cinema upon its release. Starring
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/noemie-merlant/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Noumie Merlant
          </a>
          as an 18th century painter and
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/adele-haenel/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Aduele Haenel
          </a>
          as her elusive subject,
          <em>
           Portrait Of A Lady On Fire
          </em>
          is a tale of an epic love developed in the quietest, most delicate way, formed in stolen moments and glances. Sciamma's carefully constructed script is matched by Claire Mathon's cinematography, each shot like a Renaissance painting brought to life. Pure poetry.
         </p>
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/movies/reviews/portrait-of-a-lady-on-fire/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Read Empire's review of Portrait Of A Lady On Fire
          </a>
         </p>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 bottom">
         <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-brand">

       <div class="jsx-3523802742 listicle-item" data-test="listicle-item-8">
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-image">
         <div class="jsx-3628565330 image-container">
          <div class="jsx-1901279781 image-loading">
          </div>
          <div class="lazyLoad">
           <picture class="jsx-2590794431">
            <source class="jsx-2590794431" media="(min-width:480px)" srcset=""/>
            <img alt="Lu00e9on" class="jsx-2590794431 loading" data-src="//images.bauerhosting.com/legacy/media/619d/5ed4/5165/4393/173b/793d/IMG_0294.jpeg?q=80&amp;auto=format&amp;w=500" src="" title=""/>
           </picture>
          </div>
         </div>
         <span class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-count">
          9
          <!-- -->
          of
          <!-- -->
          100
         </span>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-content">
         <p>
          In some ways,
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/luc-besson/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Luc Besson
          </a>
          's first English-language movie is a spiritual spin-off: after all, isn't
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/jean-reno/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Jean Reno
          </a>
          's eponymous hitman just Nikita's Victor The Cleaner renamed and fleshed out? Of course, its greatest strength is in
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/natalie-portman/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Natalie Portman
          </a>
          , delivering a luminous, career-creating performance as vengeful 12-year-old Mathilda, whose relationship with the monosyllabic killer is truly affecting, and nimbly stays just on the right side of acceptable.
         </p>
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/movies/reviews/leon-review/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Read Empire's review of L�on
          </a>
         </p>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 bottom">
         <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-brand">
          <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-content">
          </div>
          <div class="jsx-4290002108 brand">
           <img alt="Amazon" class="jsx-4290002108 amazon-no-prime" src="data:image/png;base64,"/>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="jsx-3523802742 listicle-item" data-test="listicle-item-9">
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-image">
         <div class="jsx-3628565330 image-container">
          <div class="jsx-1901279781 image-loading">
          </div>
          <div class="lazyLoad">
           <picture class="jsx-2590794431">
            <source class="jsx-2590794431" media="(min-width:480px)" srcset=""/>
            <img alt="Logan" class="jsx-2590794431 loading" data-src="//images.bauerhosting.com/legacy/media/619d/7202/dbee/af4f/0d68/fe72/IMG_0293.jpeg?q=80&amp;auto=format&amp;w=500" src="" title=""/>
           </picture>
          </div>
         </div>
         <span class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-count">
          10
          <!-- -->
          of
          <!-- -->
          100
         </span>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-content">
         <p>
          If you're going to wrap up your tenure as one of the most loved superhero icons in fiction, it's hard to think of a better way than how
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/hugh-jackman/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Hugh Jackman
          </a>
          � with
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/james-mangold/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           James Mangold
          </a>
          directing � punched out on the time clock of playing Wolverine. Set in a dark near-future world where an aging Logan is caring for a mentally unstable Professor Xavier (
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/patrick-stewart/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Patrick Stewart
          </a>
          ) and getting mixed up yet again with some very dangerous people ,
          <em>
           Logan
          </em>
          is a truly original superhero tale that is mournful without being morbid. It's so outside the established mold, in fact, it's honestly a wonder the film ever got made.
         </p>
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/movies/reviews/logan-review/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Read Empire's review of Logan
          </a>
         </p>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 bottom">
         <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-brand">
          <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-content">
          </div>
          <div class="jsx-4290002108 brand">
           <img alt="Amazon" class="jsx-4290002108 amazon-no-prime" src="data:image/png;base64,"/>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="jsx-3523802742 listicle-ad-wrapper">
        <div class="jsx-584588131">
         <div class="jsx-584588131 advert" id="inline-mpu-gallery-05">
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="jsx-3523802742 listicle-item" data-test="listicle-item-10">
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-image">
         <div class="jsx-3628565330 image-container">
          <div class="jsx-1901279781 image-loading">
          </div>
          <div class="lazyLoad">
           <picture class="jsx-2590794431">
            <source class="jsx-2590794431" media="(min-width:480px)" srcset=""/>
            <img alt="The Terminator" class="jsx-2590794431 loading" data-src="//images.bauerhosting.com/legacy/media/619d/72d1/5909/d00e/394c/86c8/IMG_0292.jpeg?q=80&amp;auto=format&amp;w=500" src="" title=""/>
           </picture>
          </div>
         </div>
         <span class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-count">
          11
          <!-- -->
          of
          <!-- -->
          100
         </span>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-content">
         <p>
          It features time travel and a cyborg, with car chases and shoot-outs, but in
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/james-cameron/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           James Cameron
          </a>
          's first proper movie (ie. not featuring flying piranhas) it's all packed around the blood-covered endoskeleton of a relentless-killer horror pic. After all, what is
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/arnold-schwarzenegger/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Arnold Schwarzenegger
          </a>
          's Uzi-9mm-toting Terminator, if not an upgraded version of
          <em>
           Halloween
          </em>
          's Michael Myers?
         </p>
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/movies/reviews/terminator-review/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Read Empire's review of The Terminator
          </a>
         </p>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 bottom">
         <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-brand">
          <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-content">
          </div>
          <div class="jsx-4290002108 brand">
           <img alt="Amazon" class="jsx-4290002108 amazon-no-prime" src="data:image/png;base64,"/>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>

       <div class="jsx-3523802742 listicle-item" data-test="listicle-item-11">
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-image">

        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-content">
         <p>
          The Coen brothers'
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/cormac-mccarthy/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Cormac McCarthy
          </a>
          adaptation is a tension-ratcheting, 1980 Texas-set chase movie, which also thoughtfully considers the question: how can good people ever possibly deal with a world going to shit? It also revealed that
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/javier-bardem/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Javier Bardem
          </a>
          makes an awesome villain; ever since he played
          <em>
           No Country
          </em>
          's cold-blooded assassin Anton Chigurh, Hollywood can't stop making him the bad guy.
         </p>
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/movies/reviews/country-old-men-review/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Read Empire's review of No Country For Old Men
          </a>
         </p>

        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-content">
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/james-cameron/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           James Cameron
          </a>
          doesn't do things by halves. His movie about the 1912 sinking of the world's biggest cruise liner was the most expensive ever made, suffered a difficult, overrunning shoot, and was predicted to be a career-ending flop. But it turned out to be one of the most successful films of all time (in terms of both box office and Awards), and made him King Of The World.
         </p>
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/movies/reviews/titanic-2-review/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Read Empire's review of Titanic
          </a>
         </p>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 bottom">
         <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-brand">
          <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-content">

        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-image">

        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-content">
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/william-friedkin/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           William Friedkin
          </a>
          's horror masterwork, in which a 12-year-old girl is possessed by a demon, has a reputation as a shocker (in the good sense), with the pea-soup vomit, head-spin and crucifix abuse moments the most regularly cited. But the reason it chills so deeply is the way it sustains and builds its disquieting atmosphere so craftily and consistently throughout.
         </p>
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/movies/reviews/exorcist-director-cut-review/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Read Empire's review of The Exorcist
          </a>
         </p>

            <img alt="Black Panther" class="jsx-2590794431 loading" data-src="//images.bauerhosting.com/legacy/media/619d/7604/5909/d02b/0a4c/86e1/IMG_0288.jpeg?q=80&amp;auto=format&amp;w=500" src="" title=""/>

         <span class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-count">

        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-content">
         <p>
          After his standout introduction in
          <em>
           Captain America: Civil War
          </em>
          , 2018's
          <em>
           Black Panther
          </em>
          allowed us to properly meet
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/chadwick-boseman/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Chadwick Boseman
          </a>
          's T'Challa, and see his Wakandan kingdom in all its glory. Impeccably directed by
          <em>
           Creed
          </em>
          's
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/ryan-coogler/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Ryan Coogler
          </a>
          , it's an Afrofuturistic vision oozing with cool, colourful regality, expressed through its Oscar-winning costume design, stunning set pieces and thrumming soundtrack. Soaring to billion dollar-plus box office takings, Black Panther's cultural impact cannot be understated � and after the tragic loss of Boseman in 2020, the film lives on as the defining role for a truly remarkable talent.
         </p>
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/movies/reviews/black-panther-review-2/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Read Empire's review of Black Panther
          </a>
         </p>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 bottom">
         <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-brand">
          <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-content">
          </div>
          <div class="jsx-4290002108 brand">
           <img alt="Amazon" class="jsx-4290002108 amazon-no-prime" src="data:image/png;base64,"/>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="jsx-3523802742 listicle-item" data-test="listicle-item-15">
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-image">
         <div class="jsx-4202917420 image-container">
          <div class="jsx-1901279781 image-loading">

            <source class="jsx-2590794431" media="(min-width:480px)" srcset=""/>
            <img alt="Shaun Of The Dead" class="jsx-2590794431 loading" data-src="//images.bauerhosting.com/legacy/media/619d/76a9/3ebe/47fc/719c/e242/IMG_0286.jpeg?q=80&amp;auto=format&amp;w=500" src="" title=""/>
           </picture>

         <span class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-count">

          of

         </span>

        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-content">
         <p>
          Before its release, you might have been forgiven for thinking it would be
          <em>
           Spaced: The Movie
          </em>
          . But
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/edgar-wright/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Edgar Wright
          </a>
          ,
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/simon-pegg/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Simon Pegg
          </a>
          and
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/nick-frost/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Nick Frost
          </a>
          's first feature is genuinely stand-alone: a savvy blend of proper-funny comedy and seriously gruesome undead-horror which, funnily enough, played a big part in the zombie-movie resurgence we're still enjoying now.
         </p>
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/movies/reviews/shaun-dead-review/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Read Empire's review of Shaun Of The Dead
          </a>
         </p>
        </div>

            <img alt="Lost In Translation" class="jsx-2590794431 loading" data-src="//images.bauerhosting.com/legacy/media/619d/785c/dbee/afdb/9068/fead/IMG_0285.jpeg?q=80&amp;auto=format&amp;w=500" src="" title=""/>

         <span class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-count">
          17

          of

         </span>

        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-content">
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/sofia-coppola/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Sofia Coppola
          </a>
          's second film is the ultimate jet lag movie, locating its central almost-romance between listless college grad
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/scarlett-johansson/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Scarlett Johansson
          </a>
          and life-worn actor
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/bill-murray/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Bill Murray
          </a>
          amid the woozy, daydreamy bewilderment of being in a very foreign country and a very different time zone. And it's exactly right that we still don't know what he whispered to her at the end.
         </p>
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/movies/reviews/lost-translation-review/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Read Empire's review of Lost In Translation
          </a>
         </p>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 bottom">
         <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-brand">
          <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-content">
          </div>
          <div class="jsx-4290002108 brand">
           <img alt="Amazon" class="jsx-4290002108 amazon-no-prime" src="data:image/png;base64,"/>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>

       <div class="jsx-3523802742 listicle-item" data-test="listicle-item-17">
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-image">
         <div class="jsx-3628565330 image-container">
          <div class="jsx-1901279781 image-loading">
          </div>
          <div class="lazyLoad">
           <picture class="jsx-2590794431">
            <source class="jsx-2590794431" media="(min-width:480px)" srcset=""/>
            <img alt="Thor: Ragnarok" class="jsx-2590794431 loading" data-src="//images.bauerhosting.com/legacy/media/619d/791c/5165/4341/f63b/7a3b/IMG_0284.jpeg?q=80&amp;auto=format&amp;w=500" src="" title=""/>
           </picture>
          </div>
         </div>
         <span class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-count">
          18
          <!-- -->
          of
          <!-- -->
          100
         </span>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 listicle-item-content">
         <p>
          Marvel has cannily employed directors who have more usually made smaller, indie movies, handed them the keys to the giant machine that is their cinematic universe and (within reason) let them do their thing. Among the best to grasp that opportunity is
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/taika-waititi/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Taika Waititi
          </a>
          , who helped find Thor's true funny bone, a more effective weapon than Mjolnir.
          <em>
           Ragnarok
          </em>
          , which shakes up Thor's entire world (by, er, destroying it) is a hilarious take on a superhero story, full of action, while re-introducing
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/mark-ruffalo/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Mark Ruffalo
          </a>
          's Hulk in fantastic fashion and having us meet the likes of
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/tessa-thompson/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Tessa Thompson'
          </a>
          s Valkyrie and
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/people/jeff-goldblum/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Jeff Goldblum
          </a>
          's Grandmaster.
         </p>
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.empireonline.com/movies/reviews/thor-ragnarok-review/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           Read Empire's review of Thor: Ragnarok
          </a>
         </p>
        </div>
        <div class="jsx-4245974604 bottom">
         <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-brand">
          <div class="jsx-4245974604 price-content">
          </div>
          <div class="jsx-4290002108 brand">
           <img alt="Amazon" class="jsx-4290002108 amazon-no-prime" src="data:image/png;base64,"/>
          </div>
         </div>

       </div>
       <div class="jsx-3523802742 listicle-ad-wrapper">

         <div class="jsx-584588131 advert" id="inline-mpu-gallery-09">
